result.title: Deepened policy brief
result.description: Deepened policy brief The deliverable will summarize the outcomes regarding regulatory social organizational market and technical challenges for innovation management at an early stage of the project The outcomes will be used to inform external actors such as the commission and local governments towards innovation management with regard to the water sector Task 86
